org.foxlabs.validation

Interface Validation<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of value to be validated
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Constraint<V>, Converter<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConverter, AbstractValidation, ArrayConverter, ArrayElementConstraint, BigDecimalConverter, BigIntegerConverter, BooleanConverter, ByteConverter, CapitalizeAllConstraint, CapitalizeConstraint, CascadeConstraint, CharacterConverter, CheckConstraint, ClassConverter, CoalesceConstraint, CollectionConverter, CollectionElementConstraint, ConstraintAggregation, ConstraintComposition, ConstraintConjunction, ConstraintDisjunction, ConstraintGroupWrapper, ConstraintMessageWrapper, ConstraintNegation, ConstraintWrapper, ConverterMessageWrapper, ConverterWrapper, CorrectConstraint, CustomConstraint, CustomConverter, DateConverter, DefaultValueConstraint, DespaceConstraint, DoubleConverter, EmailAddressConstraint, EnumConverter, EnumerationConstraint, EnumerationConstraint.Default, FileConverter, FileExistsConstraint, FileSizeConstraint, FloatConverter, FutureDateConstraint, HostnameConstraint, IdentifierConstraint, IgnoreCaseEnumerationConstraint, IllegalCharsetConstraint, ImageSizeConstraint, ImageSizeConstraint.AwtCodec, ImageSizeConstraint.RawCodec, InetAddressConstraint, InstanceOfConstraint, IntegerConverter, Ip4AddressConstraint, Ip6AddressConstraint, IpAddressConstraint, IsFalseConstraint, IsNullConstraint, IsTrueConstraint, LegalCharsetConstraint, LocaleConverter, LogLevelConstraint, LogLevelConverter, LongConverter, LowerCaseConstraint, MapConverter, MapKeyConstraint, MapValueConstraint, MaxLengthConstraint, MimeTypeConstraint, NotBlankConstraint, NotEmptyConstraint, NotEmptyConstraint.ArrayType, NotEmptyConstraint.CollectionType, NotEmptyConstraint.MapType, NotEmptyConstraint.StringType, NotNullConstraint, NullifyConstraint, NumberConverter, NumberConverter.DecimalType, NumberConverter.IntegerType, PastDateConstraint, PropertyComparisonConstraint, PropertyComparisonConstraint.EqualToOp, PropertyComparisonConstraint.GreaterThanEqualOp, PropertyComparisonConstraint.GreaterThanOp, PropertyComparisonConstraint.LessThanEqualOp, PropertyComparisonConstraint.LessThanOp, PropertyComparisonConstraint.NotEqualToOp, RangeConstraint, RegexConstraint, RemoveNullElementsConstraint, RemoveNullElementsConstraint.ArrayType, RemoveNullElementsConstraint.CollectionType, ReplaceConstraint, SequenceConverter, SequenceElementConstraint, UnsupportedConverter, UpperCaseConstraint, UriAddressConstraint, URIConverter, UrlAddressConstraint, URLConverter

    public interface Validation<V>
    The root interface in the validation hierarchy. Validation is an abstract component that allows somehow validate values and may generate ViolationException if validation fails.

    Validation implementations should be immutable.

    Author:
    Fox Mulder
    See Also:
    ValidationContext

      boolean appendMessageArguments(ValidationContext<?> context, Map<String,Object> arguments)
      Determines if error message template returned by the method getMessageTemplate(ValidationContext) needs to be rendered and appends arguments to be substituted into the error message template.

      Returns localized error message template.
      Class<?> getType()
      Returns the type of value to be validated.

        Returns the type of value to be validated.

      • getMessageTemplate

        String getMessageTemplate(ValidationContext<?> context)
        Returns localized error message template.

        Note that this method may return null.

        Parameters:
        context - Validation context.
        Returns:
        Localized error message template.

      • appendMessageArguments

        boolean appendMessageArguments(ValidationContext<?> context,
                               Map<String,Object> arguments)
        Determines if error message template returned by the method getMessageTemplate(ValidationContext) needs to be rendered and appends arguments to be substituted into the error message template.
        Parameters:
        context - Validation context.
        arguments - Arguments to be substituted into the error message template.
        Returns:
        true if error message template needs to be rendered; false otherwise.
